member.name: T:Sitemap.Plugin.SitemapMiddleware
member.summary: Sitemap middleware class, this module extends BaseMiddlware and is injected into the request pipeline.

member.name: M:Sitemap.Plugin.SitemapMiddlewareExtender.UseSitemaps(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary:
IApplicationBuilder extender method.
Allows easy use of registering SitemapMiddleware.Plugin

member.name: T:Sitemap.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.SitemapTimingsSubMenu
member.summary:
Returns Timings information for all time spent processing Sitemap requests and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: M:Sitemap.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.SitemapTimingsSubMenu.Data
member.summary: Returns Timings data in milliseconds for time spent processing by Sitemap.Plugin requests.

member.name: T:Sitemap.Plugin.PluginInitialisation
member.summary: Implements IPlugin which allows the Sitemap.Plugin module to be loaded as a plugin module
